articles.description: India captain gained 47 rating points and moved up one slot following scores of 73 and 77
articles.content: India's captain Virat Kohli has moved back into the top five of the ICC's T20I rankings for batsmen, while England's Jos Buttler jumped into the top 20 as a result of performances in the ongoing five… [+2040 chars]
